bibl.title: Greek-English Lexicon. Revised Supplement. Edited by Peter G.W. GLARE, with the assistance of Anne A. THOMPSON.
bibl.note: Incorporates a considerable amount of new material, mainly taken from inscriptions and papyri. - Pp. xxv-xxvii: Publications of Papyri and Ostraca.
LIDDELL Henry George, Robert SCOTT, Henry STUART JONES and Roderick McKENZIE, Greek-English Lexicon. Revised Supplement. Edited by Peter G.W. GLARE, with the assistance of Anne A. THOMPSON.
Oxford, Clarendon Press, 1996, 4°, xxxi-320 pp. ISBN 0-19-864223-7. £50.
Liddell Scott Stuart Jones McKenzie Glare Thompson
